alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:25PM CDT until May 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Southeastern Grant County in west central Nebraska... Western McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/. * At 825 PM CDT/725 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles north of Arthur to 13 miles southwest of Tryon, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Cogill Lake, Calora, Green Lake, Bucktail Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Three Mile Lake, Diamond Bar Lake, Spring Valley Lake, Bucktail, Schnick Lake and Jensen Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 127 and 150. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
